item.description:
Do you have plans for New Year's Eve yet? Of course you do! I am just reminding you to get your tickets TODAY before they sell out!

Just visit www.tinyurl.com/bostonnye to buy yours online. Don't wait to get your ticket at the door!

Details for the night:

Who is invited? YOU! Don't worry if this is your first event or are new to the city - we always have a GREAT time!

Which ticket? Get a General Admission ticket - we can "upgrade" tickets at the venue if people want to share a table.

Where/When? We will meet at the venue - I will send my cell phone number and details on Thursday.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE email me with your email address, cell phone number, RSVP YES or MAYBE so I can get in touch with you!!


[url=www.tinyurl.com/bostonnye]Get your tickets before they sell out!

I recommend you get a General Admission or VIP ticket - or save some money and message the group if people want to get a table in the General Admissions area.

Please make sure you RSVP yes, maybe or no (and only NO is you are going to be someplace warm drinking pina coladas...other than that you have no excuse for not joining us!)


For theit night of the event, we can meet at the venu- Calderwood- in the south end on Tremont St. I'll send out contact details closer to the event. Just text me or find us once you get arrive.

Transportation- Getting out of Boston on NYE is a major PAIN! Trust me, I stood in the snow trying to get a cab for over an hour last year. To prevent this, SYNERGY will have transportation from the event to T stations...details to follow....


Want a little teaser of what to expect? Check out this video!

http://www.twitvid.co...

Get your tickets at www.tinyurl.com/bostonnye



Dec 31st, 2009
9 PM - 2 AM
Age Restriction: 21+


♣♣ DRESS CODE:
Black Tie optional. Gentlemen-tuxedos or suits. Jackets are required. Ladies - evening dresses or ball gowns. No jeans, t shirts, or inappropriate attire. It is strongly recommended that you dress to match the theme.


The SYNERGY Events (recent producer of The Emerging Trends 2009 and 3rd Annual Boston Fashion Week Celebration Party) cordially invites you back to TIMELESS, for the vogue and refined, with extensive entertainment to finish the year off right.

Enjoy a night of Old Hollywood Glamour with 1940s theme at the upscale Calderwood Pavilion, a premier South End theater.

♣♣ HIGHLIGHTS:
- International upscale crowd (21-35 age group)
- The first 100 online ticket holders will receive a chance to win a brand new iPhone
- Red carpet reception
- Complimentary appetizers
- Three premium cash bars with VIP reception for VIP ticket holders
- DJ ILMADIK spinning Pop, Euro House, Arabic House, Top 40's mash up and Hip-Hop. Say no to 30 second DJs playing the same old songs from the radio!! Music directions by DJ Reaz & Farhan.
- Live Band by Violette (France/NYC). The band will start the night with an infusion of Soul, Jazz & Funk
- Glamorous vintage fashion exhibit by international fashion designer Karen Sabag (Israel/NYC)
- Live projection of midnight countdown from Times Square
- Live vocal finale by Lee Wilson (NYC/Boston)
- Outstanding décor, lights and sound
- Prizes awarded to the best dressed male and female
- Many other surprises and giveaways in store…

♣♣ SCHEDULE HIGHLIGHTS:
9:00 PM - Doors open
9:30-10:30 PM - Live Jazz/Soul Band
10:30 PM - Fashion Exhibit
12:00 AM - Live ball drop/countdown from NYC
12:30 AM - Live vocal finale
Party till 2 AM
item.name: New Years Eve- Timeless!
